channel.title: On a Rail chapter, Tram disappears [Fixed]
channel.description:
Hello everyone, just noticed kinda wierd glitch at this chapter, in part where youre going up with tram.
If youre still at "Drive" mode like me and press "E" while going up, the tram falls through elevator and you cant get it back ..
Is this just my problem or..? O_o

item.title: On a Rail chapter, Tram disappears [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: Trojan9514
item.description:
p0mmi:

Ah lol good then xD

I was just enjoying my free day from work, sipping my beer and almost spit it on the keyboard cause i did press “E” and did notice that my tram was “KTHXBAI”

That was exactly my reaction xD

Read full topic
item.source: On a Rail chapter, Tram disappears [Fixed]
